description:
🎄 Bristolian MLOps Community🎄

📅 Save the date

Looking forward to our next Bristol Meetup?

Our friends from https://www.ovoenergy.com[Ovo Energy](https://www.ovoenergy.com) will be hosting us on the 10th of January for an exciting meetup.

Agenda for the day:

**18:00** \- 🍕🍺 Welcome 🍕🍺

**18:25** \- MLOps\.Community Intro

**18:30** \- Talk 1 \- "State of the art open source LLMs\, fine tuning and other things" by [Luke Marsden](https://www.linkedin.com/in/luke-marsden-71b3789/)

**19:15** \- Talk 2 \- TBC by [Chris Booth](https://www.linkedin.com/in/chatbotbooth/)

**20:00 -** Start heading to the pub

This meetup is sponsored by [Cleo](https://web.meetcleo.com) , have a look at their website (they are hiring!)
title: MLOps Bristol - Meetup #10
